title: Hour 2: Cowboy Controversy?
description:
Dominique Foxworth, Jordan Cornette and Chris Canty all join the show to debate which Cowboy is under more scrutiny this season, Mike McCarthy or Dak Prescott. Plus Dominique Foxworth gives his list of the top-5 WRs in the NFL. Later Ryan McGee and Marty Smith show off their Wiffle Ball skills. The crew also debates if the Chiefs or Bengals would be more likely to go to the Super Bowl this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
